entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:09 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:09 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:09 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
